title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Learn JavaScript basics with hands-on projects in 7 days. This comprehensive course will take you from zero to hero in JavaScript programming.
longDescription: This course is designed for complete beginners who want to learn JavaScript from scratch. All content is written by the community and completely free. You'll learn all the fundamental concepts of JavaScript including variables, data types, functions, loops, and much more through carefully crafted written lessons and exercises.

whatYouWillLearn: Understanding JavaScript syntax and basic concepts
Working with variables, data types, and operators
Control flow: if statements, loops, and switch cases
Functions: declarations, expressions, and arrow functions
requirements: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS
A computer with a modern web browser
targetAudience: Beginners who want to learn JavaScript
Web designers looking to add interactivity
